briefTitle: Digital Breast Tomosynthesis for the Dutch National Breast Cancer Screening Program
officialTitle: Digital Breast Tomosynthesis for the Dutch National Breast Cancer Screening Program
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The effect of DBT screening on breast cancers diagnosed at an advanced stage at screening or in between rounds of screening. (detection rate of stage II+ cancers per 1000 screens and interval cancer rate per 1000 screens)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women who are invited to participate to the Dutch Breast Cancer Screening program in the age group 50-72 years..

Exclusion Criteria:

* Disabled women
* Women who are wheelchair bound
